methods.name: createOptionComponent
methods.comment: A factory method to create new OptionComponents.

params.name: state
params.comment: The state that will be used to create the correct OptionComponent

methods.javadoc:
Creates and sets a preferred alignment based upon the given list of option components.
@param components the list of options components from which to determine the alignment.
